author: Dr. Chloë E. Nunneley, Dr. Vinayak Kumar
title: Open by Easter? Relaxing coronavirus restrictions too soon could backfire.
description: Two studies published this week showed the effectiveness of social distancing in battling COVID-19.
content:
Even before President Donald Trump said he hoped to reopen the U.S. by Easter, millions were wondering: Is social distancing really worth it? And either way, when can it end?
According to two studies published this week, the answer to one of those questions … [+3680 chars]
